title: Experimental Cryptocurrency Momentum Strategy

issues.title: 'Major cryptocurrencies' not defined
issues.description: No specification of which tokens qualify
issues.suggested_fix: Define universe: 'Top 20 cryptocurrencies by market capitalization from CoinMarketCap, excluding stablecoins'

issues.title: Market cap data source not specified
issues.description: Need source for determining 'major' status
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Market capitalization data from CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko API, updated hourly'

issues.title: 'Strong upward movement' not quantified
issues.description: Completely subjective without numerical threshold
issues.suggested_fix: Define: 'Strong movement = 20% gain over past 7 days AND positive 24-hour momentum'

issues.title: 'Momentum fades' not defined
issues.description: Exit criteria completely unspecified
issues.suggested_fix: Define: 'Momentum fades when 7-day return drops below 5% OR enters negative territory'

issues.title: Leverage amount not specified
issues.description: 'use leverage' without specifying magnitude
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Maximum 2x leverage using perpetual futures. Gross exposure capped at 200% of NAV'

issues.title: Exchanges not identified
issues.description: 'exchanges' mentioned but none specified
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Primary: Coinbase Pro, Binance, Kraken. Execution split across exchanges for liquidity'

issues.title: Pricing data source not specified
issues.description: Need authoritative price source for signals and execution
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Pricing from CryptoCompare CCCAGG (aggregate) or exchange-specific APIs with median calculation'

issues.title: Algorithm execution strategy not specified
issues.description: 'using algorithms' without defining execution strategy
issues.suggested_fix: Define: 'TWAP execution over 15-minute window. Limit orders at midpoint ± 10 bps. Market orders if not filled within 30 minutes'

issues.title: Social media sources not identified
issues.description: 'social media' monitoring without specifying platforms or metrics
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Twitter sentiment analysis using LunarCrush API or specify manual vs automated monitoring'

issues.title: Sentiment impact on strategy not defined
issues.description: Mentions monitoring sentiment but no specification of how it affects decisions
issues.suggested_fix: Define: 'Negative sentiment override: Exit position if sentiment score drops below -0.5 on scale of -1 to +1'

issues.title: 'Frequently' rebalance not quantified
issues.description: Rebalancing frequency completely unspecified
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Rebalance daily at 00:00 UTC' or 'Intraday rebalancing every 6 hours'

issues.title: No risk disclosures for crypto volatility
issues.description: Crypto strategies require extensive risk warnings - completely absent
issues.suggested_fix: Add comprehensive risk section: Extreme volatility (50%+ daily moves), total loss potential, regulatory uncertainty, exchange counterparty risk, liquidity risk

issues.title: No leverage risk disclosure
issues.description: Leveraged crypto extremely risky - no warnings
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Leverage Risk: 2x leverage amplifies losses. Liquidation possible with 50% adverse move. Margin calls may force liquidation at worst prices during volatile periods'

issues.title: No custody or counterparty risk disclosure
issues.description: Exchange risk is critical for crypto - no mention
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Counterparty Risk: Assets held on exchanges subject to exchange insolvency, hacking, or operational failures. Not FDIC or SIPC insured'

issues.title: No position size limits
issues.description: No specification of position sizing or concentration limits
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Maximum 20% allocation per token. Minimum liquidity requirement: $100M 24-hour volume'

issues.title: No stop loss or drawdown controls
issues.description: No risk management parameters specified
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Individual position stop loss: 25%. Portfolio stop loss: 40% drawdown triggers deleveraging. Maximum daily loss: 10%'

issues.title: No specification of momentum calculation period
issues.description: Momentum mentioned but lookback period not defined
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Momentum calculated using 7-day, 14-day, and 30-day returns. Composite signal = weighted average'

issues.title: Return calculation method not specified
issues.description: Crypto trades 24/7 - daily return calculation time not defined
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Returns calculated using prices at 00:00 UTC daily. Intraday volatility monitored separately'

issues.title: No regulatory status disclosure
issues.description: Many crypto assets have unclear regulatory status
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Regulatory Risk: Cryptocurrencies subject to evolving regulation. Some tokens may be classified as securities. Strategy may need to terminate if regulations change'

issues.title: No specification of data reliability or validation
issues.description: Crypto data can be unreliable - no data quality measures
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Data Quality: Use median of 3+ exchange prices. Discard outliers >10% from median. Halt trading if price feeds unavailable from 2+ exchanges'

compliance_assessment.reason: Missing critical risk disclosures, undefined strategy parameters, regulatory concerns

notes: SEVERE ISSUES - Nearly impossible to implement without comprehensive specification. High risk of regulatory non-compliance. Unsuitable for investor presentation in current form.
